presentation.title: Hello, I'm Aria
presentation.name: Alessandro Fernandez
presentation.phrase: I am passionate about digital tools to serve users.
presentation.description: I am a Full Stack developer with experience in front-end and back-end web applications, as well as in the development of mobile applications and databases, I am passionate about learning new technologies and I like design.

0.description: Full Stack Developer with 1 year of experience in designing and developing web and mobile applications.

1.description: Experience in modern front-end technologies, ensuring an optimal and adaptable user experience.

2.description: Knowledge in back-end, server applications, databases, and content management systems (CMS).

3.description: Designing attractive and functional user interfaces, collaborating with design teams to achieve the desired visual identity.

4.description: Project management skills, coordinating and supervising multidisciplinary teams for project success.
